name: SuperHeaven
description:
Travel through worlds, fight nightmare sheep, and drink Soylint in SuperHeaven!

You are a student in a game design class, this game is a nightmare about your experience as you power through week after week, trying to get by at any cost.

Superheaven is a platformer with ranged combat.

External assets used:

Procedural Lightning by Digital Ruby (Jeff Johnson): https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/34217?aid=1011lGnL

Royalty free sounds from Soundbible:

  • "Catapult" by BlastWaveFX
  • "Woosh" by Mark DiAngelo
  • "Bleat" by Soundbible
